original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 19.1. Kusalattika
analyzed: kusalattika

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: 19.1.1–2. Paṭiccādivāra
Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam ekam khandha

original: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ pe dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhāḥ na kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
analyzed: abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā vipāka abyākatam kiriyā abyākatam ekam khandha

original: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo
analyzed: paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpam pe na kusalam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ

original: ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na akusalam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ

original: ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhamma

original: paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo
analyzed: paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
analyzed: na kusalañca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalañca

original: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
analyzed: na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalañca

original: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalañca
analyzed: na akusalañca na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalañca

original: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalañca
analyzed: na abyākatañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na akusalañca

original: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na akusalañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā na kusalam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā dve

original: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na akusalam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā na akusalam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā dve

original: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā dve

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā eka

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na akusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paṭicca kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā eka

original: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam ca na akusalañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati ārammaṇa paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Paccanīya
analyzed: paccanīya

original: Nahetu-naārammaṇa
analyzed: na hetuna ārammaṇa

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā …pe… nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā pe na kusalañca na akusalañca dhamma

original: paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā …pe… nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na ārammaṇa paccayā pe na kusalam ca na akusalam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na ārammaṇa paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… napurejāte dvādasa …pe… nakamme nava …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava …pe… novigate cha.
analyzed: na hetuyā cha na ārammaṇe cha na adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa pe na purejāte dvādasa pe na kamme nava pe na āhāre na indriye na jhāne na magge tīṇi pe na vippayutte nava pe no vigate cha

original: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe cha saṅkhitta

original: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cha … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe cha saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāro paṭicca vāra sadiso

original: 19.1.3–6. Paccayavārādi
analyzed: paccaya vāra ādi

original: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam dhamma

original: paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato
analyzed: paccayā akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā na kusalam dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ ca abyākataḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na akusalam dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākatam dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paccayā tīṇi

original: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paccayā … tīṇi. Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na akusalam ca na abyākatam ca dhammam paccayā tīṇi na kusalam ca na akusalam ca dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Hetuyā chabbīsati, ārammaṇe terasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate chabbīsati.
analyzed: hetuyā chabbīsati ārammaṇe terasa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate chabbīsati

original: Saṁsaṭṭhavāre hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa saṭṭhavāre hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Sampayuttavāro paṭiccavārasadiso.
analyzed: sampayutta vāro paṭicca vāra sadiso

original: 19.1.7. Pañhāvāra
analyzed: pañhāvāra

original: Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo abyākatassa
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naakusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
analyzed: na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ pañca

original: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ eka

original: Ārammaṇa
analyzed: ārammaṇa

original: Nakusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naakusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ

original: ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na kusalaḥ

original: ca naabyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayo

original: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na akusalaḥ ca na abyākataḥ ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na akusalaḥ ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare soḷasa …pe… sahajāte
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā tevīsa anantare soḷasa pe sahajāte

original: aṭṭhārasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye bāvīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte nava, pacchājāte
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa aññamaññe nava nissaye bāvīsa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa purejāte nava pacchājāte

original: cha, āsevane nava, kamme aṭṭhārasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre …pe… magge aṭṭhārasa, sampayutte
analyzed: cha āsevane nava kamme aṭṭhārasa vipāke tīṇi āhāre pe magge aṭṭhārasa sampayutte

original: nava, vippayutte dvādasa …pe… avigate dvāvīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: nava vippayutte dvādasa pe avigate dvāvīsa pañhā vāram
